frameDefinitions: An Entity has a Temperature characterized by the target.
The Fastener is an artifact created to close a Container (e.g. coat, jar).
A Cognizer retains facts in memory and is able to retrieve them.
There is a gradable amount of light in a particular Location.
In this frame the Patient, an inorganic item, undergoes a chemical process which renders it less useful, desirable or stable. '' '
In this frame a Body_mark is present on a Possessor's body.
frameExamples: The pan is already too <t>hot</t> to touch.
The door <t>seal</t> prevented air from getting in and the kids' screams from getting out.
I was impressed that she 'd actually <t>remembered</t> Radish 's name (= what Radish's name is)
The small print was bearly readable by the light of the very <t>dim</t> torch.
Mark has a cancerous <t>mole</t> on his back.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Degree</fen> for the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
This role identifies the item that is closed with the <fen>Fastener</fen>.
The artifact created to close a <fen>Container</fen>.
This role identifies the active zone of the container where the <fen>Fastener</fen> is located.
The person who retains and retrieves information.
<fen>Mental_content</fen> stored by and accessible to the <fen>Cognizer</fen>. It may derive from experience or activity or simply from being informed of it.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> retrieves <fen>Mental_content</fen> or forgets it.
The place whose amout of light is being described.  The <fen>Location</fen> can also be a location in time, as seen in the second example below:
The entity from which the light eminates.
This Frame Element denotes the <fen>Possessor</fen> of the <fen>Body_mark</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The skillet had a temperature <fex>of 230 F</fex>
On Friday night, many men will simply elect to remove their tie and unbutton their top <fex>shirt</fex> button.
Man, I have just bought the exact same belt <fex><t>buckle</t></fex> and it won't open.
We couldn't close the <fex>tent flap</fex> zipper and a lot of flies came in .
I bet <fex>Johno</fex> can remember the name of the Ramones' drummer.
Do you remember <fex>how to spell cupboard ?</fex>
<fex>Afterwards</fex>, I forgot what I was pissed off about, but I was.
She hid from the man in a dark <fex>corner</fex>.
A dim <fex>lamp</fex> swung over the entrance to the castle.
<fex>The bikes</fex> rusted from their former beauty.
Mark has a cancerous <fex><t>mole</t></fex> on his back.
<fex>Mark</fex> has a cancerous mole on his back.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Armament Research Development and Engineering Center
